attributes.action: Retain Haslar Military Hospital and to open/re-open sufficient military hospitals to ensure that our forces receive the best medical and psychological treatment that the Country can provide.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Wounded armed forces personnel need, and deserve, to be treated by and alongside other serving members. To be left to the vagaries of the Health Service is a breach of the binding covenant between the Government of the day and our serving soldiers,sailors and airmen. The Government sends our non complaining soldiers to fight in Iraq and Afghanistan and then expects them to wait in hopeless NHS lines for proper treatment. This is disgraceful!.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
